title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta.
Stir in egg mixture and season.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice paste.
Add tomato sauce and cream, simmer.
Mix in grilled chicken and serve.
